Site redesign process

Jan 1, 2024

After years of designing, exploring, and multiple restarts, I've set a deadline for my personal website. I've got around 5 different designs in my Dropbox, but it's time to stop tinkering and start delivering.

Carefully designed and built by Luc Tiemessen, check the Styleguide or source on GitHub.
